issue.title: [C++][Dataset] Scanner::ToTable race when ScanTask exit early with an error
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8874](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8874). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7180#issuecomment-631059751

The issue is when [Finish](https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/cpp/src/arrow/dataset/scanner.cc#L184-L208) exit early due to a ScanTask error, in-flight tasks may try to lock the out-of-scope mutex.
